item.description:
(if interested in 911 truth leafleting or asking noam a question (on film) contact me or others that plan to attend)

Noam Chomsky Looks at the Elections, the Economy & the World


What's Next?

Arlington Street Church

Wednesday
November 19, 2008

doors open @ 6:00 p.m.

tickets, $15
reception, $50

Noam Chomsky: The US and the World after Bush
IVAW and friends of Encuentro5 (encuentro5.org) celebrate the
post-Geo. Bush world with Noam Chomsky on Wednesday, Nov. 19 at the
Arlington Street Church
6:30-8:30pm
351 Boylston St, Boston, MA

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 911 Truth @ Noam Chomsky: Looks at the Elections, the Economy & the World
